text: Does anyone have any experience with Ecommerce Bridge and could help me with this issue? <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/LINE-ITEM-is-not-being-synced-in-Ecommerce-Bridge/m-p/298267>

I might have induced this myself by trying to seperate the creating timestamps by 1000 ms, but i added seconds so one message was technically from the "future", i tried doing the same but backdating the creation timestamps by 1000 ms seperation (-2000, -1000 and 0 ms) and it seemed to work, hmmm if i do them "all at once"! with the same timestamps it sometimes work and  sometimes not

Hey <@UGULQ6P6D> The Engagements API supports HTML so you can wrap new lines in paragraph tags and insert inline styling like this
`<p>note body</p> <p style='margin-left: 10px;'>new line</p>` and it will show up like
Awesome - thank you.  I actually ended up wrapping it in a <pre> tag and then the formatting generated in python worked beautifully.  Thanks for the help!
A perfect, a much more elegant solution than what I came up with!
